paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val30Met, including penetrance data and patient details.

functional_data.summary: Autonomic dysfunction is prominent and disabling in patients with ATTR-FAP.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: Val30Met is the most common mutation in the TTR protein in Western countries and Japan.
key_quotes: Autonomic dysfunction has been reported as an initial symptom in more than 40% of Japanese ATTR-FAP Val30Met patients.
In a study involving more than 3000 subjects enrolled in a multinational, longitudinal, observational Transthyretin Amyloidosis Outcomes Survey (THAOS), 58.7% had symptomatic orthostatic hypotension.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data focused solely on the TTR gene variant Val30Met.
